com.facebook.litho.sections

Class Section<L extends SectionLifecycle>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.sections.Section<L>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasEventDispatcher, Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestSectionCreator.TestSection

    public abstract class Section<L extends SectionLifecycle>
extends Object
implements Cloneable, HasEventDispatcher
    Represents a unique instance of a Section that is driven by its matching SectionLifecycle. To create new Section instances, use the create() method in the generated SectionLifecycle subclass which returns a Section.Builder that allows you to set values for individual props. Section instances are immutable after creation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  Section.Builder<L extends SectionLifecycle,T extends Section.Builder<L,T>>
      A builder to build a Section with a SectionLifecycle L.

      • isEquivalentTo

        public boolean isEquivalentTo(Section<?> other)
        Compares this component to a different one to check if they are the same

        This is used to be able to skip rendering a component again. We avoid using the Object.equals(Object) so we can optimize the code better over time since we don't have to adhere to the contract required for a equals method.

        Parameters:
        other - the component to compare to
        Returns:
        true if the components are of the same type and have the same props

        protected SectionLifecycle.StateContainer getStateContainer()
